haReport:
This mission was flown by:
Obltn Patrik Schorner
Ltn Florian Lasch
Ltn Mario Falck
Fw Gunther Huwyler

 The mission was flown from Bonneuil Ferme aerodrome.

Successes include the following: 
On 13/05/1916 near Varennes-en-Argonne.
A F.E.2b of Esc 20 was brought down by Bernd Lewysohn of Jasta 4.
S/Lt Marceau Riffault was killed in action.
S/Lt Bertrand Labialle was killed in action.
Bernd Lewysohn was  flying a Fokker E.III.
